  • Method Details

    • render

      default void render(boolean dragging)
      Rebders this resource into the resource panel.
      Parameters:
      dragging - Whether the user is dragging the resource

    • onFileSystemChange

      default CompletableFuture<?> onFileSystemChange(WatchEvent<Path> event)
      Called from the watcher thread when this resource updates on disc.
      Parameters:
      event - The event received from the file watcher
      Returns:
      A future for when the key can be reset. All events are ignored until this future completes
